website_summaries.verdict: An excellent gluten-free option with limited, high-quality ingredients. Suitable for dogs with various health issues, allergies, and sensitivities.
pros: Formulated with top-quality proteins and very limited ingredients, which means gluten-sensitive dogs can indulge in it
Contains probiotics that promote digestive health
Most dogs love the flavor, even those that tend to be picky eaters
cons: A few reports of "bad batches" - bags with discolored kibble, strange smell, or lots of crumbled pieces
Some reports of diarrhea until dogs adjust to eating it

customer_reviews.title: she was hit by a car prior to me adopting her and doesn't have the best control and obviously having it solid makes it a ...
customer_reviews.text: 8 ingredients. And my INCREDIBLY picky dog LOVES it! I can't tell you how rare this is. She also has a very sensitive stomach. TMI- She has issues with mainting solid stool, she was hit by a car prior to me adopting her and doesn't have the best control and obviously having it solid makes it a huge difference to both of us. She has been eating the canidae salmon kibble for a month now and has been more consistent than I can remember. I can't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pancreatitis suffering mini-Schnauzer
customer_reviews.text: After nearly losing my 9 year old mini-Schnauzer to a terrible (previously undiagnosed) Pancreatitis event, he was limited to a prescription only, low fat dog food. The nutritional value was horrible. I'd previously made most of food by hand, supplementing with an organic kibble. I did a lot of research before trying this, and it is wonderful. This is his main food. I do cook up organic chicken livers with a mix of organic pumpkin, organic ginger, and he gets a BIT of that on top of his Canidae, but if he begins to act sick,he gets only Canidae. It's keeping him not just alive, but healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Moldy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 12lb bags from amazon and they were moldy!! This stuff is expensive! I threw 2 bags full away! This works great for my Boston terrier that has skin issues but moldy?! I can’t return it because I opened both bags to check!! One bag was horribly moldy and the second was not as bad but moldy none the less!! Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Land

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Canidae salmon 24 lb grain free dry dog food from Amazon is different from the one I get from Chewy. Look at the pictures: left from Amazon and Right from Chewy. Amazon-uneven shape, light and dark coloring, even smell slightly wheaty. Chewy-more even flatter shaping, almost same color, no wheaty smell and more fish smelling. Check it out for yourself. The well being of your dog is in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: Not right?
customer_reviews.text: Have been ordering this product,for older German Shepherd and color of food has always been uniform brown in color. Most recent bag purchased, off in color many light tan and yellow pieces. This food did not set well with my dogs sensitive system.
customer_reviews.author: terri baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Last year my dog started scratching a lot. The vet assumed it was due to fleas and recommended a 30-day flea treatment. I never found any fleas on her, so I decided to change her diet instead. After much research, I switched her food from supermarket-bought brands to Canidae grain free. The results have been great. She no longer scratches and her coat is thicker and shinier. As a matter of fact, the house is now much cleaner because she does not shed hair. I buy three or four flavors of this food to give her some variety. She loves them all.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Who Ate Manhattan Will Not Touch This
customer_reviews.text: Our regular dog food was out of stock, so I bought this thinking I could mix it and ease him into something readily available. No way! He actually picked the kibbles of this out of his bowl and spit them on the floor. I have seriously never seen him NOT eat something that was in his dish -- until this. The ingredients seem to be high quality. Guess my boy just doesn't like fancy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I received a bad batch. My dog is sensitive and this is the only food she can tolerate ... but since I have been feeding her from the food in the most recent package she has been vomiting. :( check the expiration date before you make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Prone
customer_reviews.text: I have a Blue Staffy AKA Blue Pit. He has had itchy rash ever since he was a pup. Did research and found good reviews about Canidae. I decided to order it for him. His itchy red rash disappeared. Wish I would have taken before and after pictures! Great dog food for allergy prone dogs! I also have a Red Patch Staffy. She was periodically throwing up and diarrhea. Spent $400 each visit for them to tell me they don't know what was the cause. Since I have change dog food to Canidae my Strawberry patch has not had a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Food was expired...smelled terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and when I poured it into the dog food bin I noticed it was funny colored and smelled terrible. So I went on a hunt for the expiration date and it was 6/03/19. Thank goodness I didn not give it to my dog! I dumped it right in the trash. That was expensive trash since it was a 12lb bag. Make sure to check expiration dates before opening.
customer_reviews.author: Telis Bertsekas

customer_reviews.title: Pug vomited food immediately after eating it!
customer_reviews.text: Kibble is not the same as from local pet food store. Kibble is smaller, darker, and full of oil. There was liquid oil in the bottom of the bag. Before I fed this to my pug I called Canidae to ask them about the inconsistency of the kibble. I was told the kibble will vary in size, shape, and consistency as the food is made in small batches. I fed it to my pug and he was very hesitant to eat it. After he ate, he immediately vomited. The kibble is clearly not the same as what I buy at the local feed store and will never purchase another bag online. Amazon was very helpful and I received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: my dog certainly loves it
customer_reviews.text: pros - kibble texture helps encourage my pup to chew - can feed her less - no adverse effect as had with blue buffalo - her stool is firm - no longer need to buy treats, just use a handful of this stuff cons - food smells like a rotting carcass (I have it in an airtight container now, thanks to IRIS) - when my pup farts it smells like a rotting carcass (put an air purifier next to her bed with a charcoal filter, still gross) - bag material split open down the center and spilled everywhere after opening the box from amazon. my dog did not feel this was a problem
customer_reviews.author: 8bitwhit

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: So I have no idea how it tastes but since my dog dives in and eats it I'm going to assume it tastes good. When I put my dog on this food in January 2020 after being diagnosed as diabetic I was hoping he would lose a few pounds, and I'm happy to say he has enjoyed eating it and he has lost 12 lbs since January safely. His energy is better and he seems very satisfied or at least as much as a dog who loves to eat can. I love this brand for all my dogs so I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: My dog loooves this food
customer_reviews.text: Excelent!! I have a Golden Retriever who doesn't get too excited about kibble, he eats it but the plate could stay full of food for a few hours. With this food, he eats it all instantly! He loves it and it has been experiencing no gas and even the poop smells different. I chose this brand because it is ranked as the best dried kibble in the market and it has been quite a success. Great ingredients, thinking about our pet's heatlh. Real meat, no by products, grain and corn free (a must!)
customer_reviews.author: StacyJelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality food
customer_reviews.text: Both my Labradors have been fed this for a few years, they eat it readily and are very healthy on it. One is 8 years old the other is 16 years old. No negative issues. They do make more stool as other commenters have said previously because of the higher fiber, but for my 16 year old this is a good thing. All other foods I've had him on gave him diarrhea or loose stools. This is the only one that gives both dogs solid stools, doesn't cause vomiting or make them gassy.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz

customer_reviews.title: Aromatic to dogs, pungent to humans, it’s not fresh.
customer_reviews.text: I have two toy poodles. One is a “drama queen” fussing about dog food to hope for human food. The other one just like his food, no matter what. However, with this particular bag (my first) of Canidae, both are just too eager to whoop it in and finish their portions in no time. I attribute this to the almost too strong pungent smell to humans, which is obliviously taken as pleasantly aromatic to dogs. But I know full well that we shall not rely on dogs for standards of freshness. I suspect the bag is stale if not expired. I hesitate to recommend it to myself again or to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great benefits!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely glad I purchased this! My dog has always been sensitive to food and always had poop issues. My dog loved it so much that when I started to slowly introduce it (mix it in with his old food), he only ate Canidae! He started to get belly cramps and loose stool because of that. It didn’t take long for him to get used to it though. I can tell that it has vastly improved his health. He started acting like a puppy again and his stool has significantly improved. I will be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great option for dogs with sensitivities to standard protein
customer_reviews.text: After spending thousands of dollars at the vet because of incessant accidents in the house, our vet recommended exotic pet food like kangaroo. Initially they thought it was worms. Then the diagnosis was that she likely had something similar to ulcerative colitis in humans and testing was recommended every 6 months. $250 per blood test alone! And exotic dog foods are not easily purchased from big box stores. We opted to try Wild Boar as chicken, salmon and regular pork seemed to be epic failures. This brand had great success. She has been accident free and healthy for over 2 years now. She is not food aggressive and seems to enjoy eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Schiele

customer_reviews.title: She loves Canidae Pure Sea flavor and her allergies are so much better. Other two dogs can eat anything
customer_reviews.text: One of three dogs is allergic to everything, so we have tried a lot of different brands and flavors of dog food. She loves Canidae Pure Sea flavor and her allergies are so much better. Other two dogs can eat anything, but they both also love Canidae Pure Sea. At one time, I was buying a different food for each dog. It is much simpler when all 3 eat the same food.
customer_reviews.author: BootsieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: should have read reviews
customer_reviews.text: My dog will only eat this dog food. But because of the Coronavirus, Petco and Chewy were out of it. I could only get the large $69.00 bag for my small dog, but that was okay. I saw she wasn't eating much, only when she was really hungry, and them not finishing half the food in her bowl. I just thought it was because of the upset in her routine with my husband working from home. Then she started to vomit. Then I read the reviews. Please be very careful if you order this. But the good thing is Amzaon refunded my money quickly and i did not have to return the bad food
customer_reviews.author: Carole McAneny

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch around Sept 3rd?
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new bag on Sept 3, opened on Sept 9th. We have used same dog Candidae Pure Sea for last few years. This bag gave our dog runny, messy stool after each feeding. We only fed her twice from this bag. We ran down to local pet store bought a bag of same food Pure Sea and her potty was back to normal. Something was wrong with this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They like it. I like it's very tiny kibble size
customer_reviews.text: My Chi-Pin and my Chi-57 both, after two weeks of thinking about this new kibble, have begun to eat it. They like it. I like it's very tiny kibble size, as both my dogs are under 10 lbs., one has only a few teeth left, the smaller one has respiratory issues. The get Canidae canned food and eat the kibble after they're absolutely sure, I am NOT feeding them any MY dinner. They've enjoyed Canidae kibble for two years. I chose this one because its for senior dogs, very tiny kibble for small breeds, and not one no-no ingredient. Good job, Canidae! I had ved any dogs I've had Canidae. Best foot on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Approved by FDA
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this food about 4 months ago. One beagle was overweight and had all kinds of allergy symptoms. The other beagle just didn't care for the food. Found out the old food was on the FDA list for heart disease in dogs. Switched to this brand per recommendations from other beagle owners. The allergies are gone, skin and coat shine, lost weight, and the other boy happily eats his food with no problems. Love being able to get delivery cause it's just too peopley outside.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this formula
customer_reviews.text: We love this food. We put a little water on it and mix it with some chicken drippings or whatever we have, along with a capsule of fish oil and some enzymes and she gobbles it up. She is a year and a half old Belgium Malinois and is extremely active. This food twice a day keeps her going! We are going to transition her to their regular chicken formula soon. We tried other foods and came back to Canidae.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha from Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great For Sensitive Stomachs
customer_reviews.text: My 1-year old golden retriever has a very sensitive stomach and a plethora of health issues. I decided to switch her to Canidae Pure Sea because I know fish is a great source of protein and is very healthy. We had a pretty rough time with the transition, but now she's been eating the food for a few weeks and her poops consistently look great and to my surprise, she hasn't been sick at all recently! The food is a bit smelly due to the fish content but it's not awful and the dog loves it. I'm definitely impressed, although considering sent hung to Costco's Salmon and Sweet Potato recipe to save a few dollars...
customer_reviews.author: S. Wiezel

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Canidae line of kibble.
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog had lost about 9# on the the Overweight Management kibble from ProPlan BUT then she started losing a lot of her haircoat...not shedding as wrong time of year. So, I felt she needed a higher protein, high meat content kibble and switched her to the Canidae. She has put on 1 lb. and doesn't act as starved as she did before so I hope this kibble will keep her at the weight she is now and healthier. She does like the taste of it. Canidae has a good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy d.

customer_reviews.title: Kudos on the delivery
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this same food for years. Good quality. Happy dog. What I want to point out is that, now that I buy it from Amazon (since no local stores carry it, anymore), the great big, heavy bag comes in a great big box. Today, that box was a little beat up. So, the delivery guy knocked, & asked me if I'd like to open it with him there, in case there was anything damaged & he should return it. THANK YOU!!! As it happens, the bag of dog food was fine. And, the rest of my day is a little brighter. <3
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a Rottweiler that has seizures. We looked all over for food for him that doesn't have a lot of added spices and preservatives and this was the only one we could find. Harley went from weekly, serious seizures to monthly seizures that are much shorter and easier to manage. This is a great product for dogs with food allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. BynackTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Helps itchy dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having pretty intense itching problems so I switched to this and it significantly cut back on her itching to where it's not a real problem for her anymore. After a while I tried her on something else and she went back to itching so I have kept her on this. My other dog also eats it and they both gobble it down. It helps maintain his weight too. The only thing that keeps it from a five star for me is that it doesn't come in a resealable bag and it's too expensive for the amount you get and how quickly they go through it.
customer_reviews.author: OlyNomad

customer_reviews.title: This is the best puppy food ! Mine ...
customer_reviews.text: Monday, April 06, 2020 This is the puppy food that mine just loves. I give our adult Cavalier King Charles Spaniel the regular Canidae so of course they were my first thought when looking for puppy dry food for our new Cavalier King Charles Spaniel puppy. He just loves it and I returned and ordered a second bag. Our veterinarian, Dr. Emmerich at Racine Veterinary is very pleased with his growth progress to date. It must be very yummy as he wines at his dish when he's eaten it all up!
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they changed this Amazon formula, but the latest order of Salmon dog food gave both of our dogs diarrhea, the younger of which we ended up having to take to the vet. Nothing else changed in their diet, but as soon as we took them off of this food their digestive systems balanced right out. We've bought our food through Amazon 10 times, but never again. Alexa, where's the nearest pet food store?
customer_reviews.author: kindred

customer_reviews.title: Must be Yummy
customer_reviews.text: After so extreme shopping at several pet food stores, I decided to try this for my troubled dog. Tsunami has had lots of medical issues all his life - seizures, leg amputated with cancer, and now stomach/digestive issues. This food has a limited number of main ingredients. He seems to love it. He has fewer tummy problems. And it is cheaper on Amazon than at the store. Kinda perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LATeach

customer_reviews.title: Max loves it. Great food.
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell had been lethargic, seemed ill, and just wasn't eating well. We tried other brands and types of natural grain free dog foods and none seemed to make a difference. Tried this one and Max could barely chew fast enough to consume it. His energy levels are back up, he's notably happier, and looks forward to dinner time. Very pleased with the limited ingredients, I don't trust some of the fillers in other food. I would highly recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: I had to find another food for my 12 year old husky, super picky and super sensitive stomach. I used to buy this kind but I don't remember why I bought other ones instead. I read a review from another customer with another husky whose diarrhea was cured by this food so I got a small bag. He ate it right up and within a day his poop was normal again. He had diarrhea for several days and I was starting to get worried and was going to take him to the vet for all kinds of tests to see if something internal was wrong. This is a mid-high priced food but so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Doe Z

customer_reviews.title: Do your due diligence. . .
customer_reviews.text: I sure wish I had done mine. Ugh Sadly, I have to agree with other reviewers . . . Canidae Pure purchased on Amazon is not the same as what you receive when bought at big box stores. We'd already gone through 24 lbs of the exact same food even the flavor. So I knew they loved it. The food itself is somewhat lighter in color & larger in size. The true test was that my 2 would take a couple of bites then stop at that. They out & out protested it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: My dog is at Vet now 😭
customer_reviews.text: My husband noticed this food has changed color and size but I thought they just changed formula. After few weeks of feeding, both of my dogs got sick, throwing up and having diarrhea. Older dog got sicker than younger one and I figured it was the food. I changed food and now younger one is good but older one is at Vet doing blood test and may be ultrasound. Please don’t buy this food until Amazon figure out. I should have read the review.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a dog food that works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to almost everything! This dog food with its “limited ingredients” was just what I have been searching for. The price is especially good because the other dog foods in this category are over the top expensive and I can’t afford them. This isn’t cheap but at least is “reasonable”. I will continue to buy this brand. Highly recommend it. My dog loves it! Finally no more food allergies to deal with!! 👍🏼👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: No problems with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice high quality dog food and because it's salmon, I don't have to deal with putting gross oily fish oil in my dog's food every day! It's a nice small size so my little dog has no problems eating it. She has some allergies and I've had no problems at all with this dog food. I can't say that my dog LOVES it, but honestly, I've never found a dry food that she loves. She's a skinny Italian Greyhound and has never been into dry food. She gets a little homemade wet food in the morning and this is a nice addiction to her diet.
customer_reviews.author: Longshot

customer_reviews.title: My Frenchies love this food!
customer_reviews.text: French bulldogs can have gastro issues, as any Frenchie owner can tell you. I've tried many brands with my two snorters, and this is so far the one they can digest the best. Also, by the way they scarf it down I can tell they love it. In my opinion, this is a great chow for French Bullies.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: All 4 Of My Dogs Love It!
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever looked at Canidae's ratings on Dogfoodadvisor.com, you know that they produce quality products. This Grain Free Pure Sea with Fresh Salmon formula gets 5 stars. The price is right. And it's delivered to my door. I have 4 dogs to feed. I mix this with the All Life Stages Formula. All 4 dogs love it. I try to buy the best quality that I can afford for them, as I feel that feeding them high quality food is one of the most important things you can do for them and their quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Azile68

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are happy!
customer_reviews.text: Had originally purchased the Candidae lamb 40 pd bag but it upset my dog's stomach. This one is also grain free and much more expensive but it doesn't upset my dog's stomach and that's a plus when it comes to cleaning up. It has significantly helped the shedding as well. My dog used to shed his hair a lot and this has helped in reducing that. His shedding is not as visible. I have a big and small dog so the bite sizes are perfect for both.
customer_reviews.author: Marpessa420

customer_reviews.title: Is there something wrong with new badges?
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars as my dog loved this food so bad, but recently (since I got a new bag) my dog has been having an upset tummy for weeks now. I’ve been trying to feed her with a mix of Canidae and plain food and she kind of improves a bit, but whenever I take away the plain food, things worsen again. I’m pretty sure it is a problem with this new badge or something because she was doing great for the past 5 months. Is someone having the same issue with bags purchased in the past two months?
customer_reviews.author: Pilar Peterson Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: absolutely horrible breath.
customer_reviews.text: Switched to CANIDAE based on a recommendation and because our Husky rescue suffers severely from zinc deficiency syndrome. That's another story as I've now spent plenty on Vets who know less that I do about this. Anyway, wanted to switch to a quality grain-free food along with the zinc supplement. I'd give more stars BUT we also have 2 Beardies and the breath on all 3 dogs once switched over to CANIDAE will literally knock you over, it's putrid. And it's NOT their teeth, it's definitely from the food. Trying some other brands to see if we can find a way to still live with the dogs....absolutely horrible breath.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Could be much better.
customer_reviews.text: I like the brand. Having said that, I noticed that the salmon variety seems to constantly vary in shade and even color. I'm uncertain if this impacts quality or consistency. The reason I can't recommend it for sensitive dogs is because my 2 year old GSD hasn't had completely solid stool since switching to the salmon variety 3 months ago. I didn't rush, but time to move on.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: My puppy get sick because the item that I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy get sick because the item that I bought was exactly the same brand, same barcode, same everything except the texture of the food that it’s inside and I brought my puppy to a vet Hospital to get check because she got vomiting and diarrhea after she ate this food. I spend $624.00 just to get her check.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this after having my dogs on BilJack. One dog developed urinary stones (in the kidney, ureter and bladder). After researching the issue and discussing this with my vet, I found urinary stones are fairly common on BilJack. After researching other choices, I selected this brand. I switched all my dogs over to this and so far they are consuming less, they seem to get full, and enjoy the taste. More expensive than some common brand feed, but much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell C

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy from another online website for this dog food. I have purchased this exact brand for the past 6 months. My dog became violently ill with bloody diarrhea after eating from this purchased bag of dog food. I threw it away after the first week after opening it. Changed foods then he was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Salmon meal, smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was salmon meal, not actual salmon. My dog does not like kibble dog food and stops eating them soon after trying. Same with this food, which is ok because it stinks and makes his breath stink. Switched to freeze dried human grade food base and add our own fresh protein. No more scratching and the dog eats it all. No more kibble for us.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this dog food since one of my pups has very sensitive skin & seasonal allergies. The first two bags we bought were consistently the same smell, color etc. but the last bag we bought smelled very strong and the color of the food was different. My dogs hardly touch it now. I don’t know if it was just a bad batch, but definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Helped our dogs skin allergies
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs have been having skin allergies and I decided to give this flavor a try. While they are still having a little bit of an issue, we have been able to stop giving the daily allergy meds. They were originally eating 4health brand and then we switched to the Canideae multi dog food. They still had a little issue with that, but this Salmon one seems to be good and doing the trick.
customer_reviews.author: McGee

customer_reviews.title: So far we love this food
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this food...we had to switch from Taste of the Wild as that did not agree with our dogs at all. They've been on this for a week now and so far no issues. Calorie content is much higher than a lot of other kibble so make sure you pay attention to that when deciding how much to give to your fur kid. Shipped very quickly! *Update: We're on our second bag and dogs are doing well! Order always come quickly as well!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our sog’s breeder serves the Canidae pure sky to all of her dogs and pups. Our dog is now 2 1/2 and has been getting this food almost her entire life. We can only find it on Amazon and the subscription service makes our lives so easy. We tried a couple other foods but they gave her (she’s an Australian Labradoodle) tummy trouble and she wasn’t as happy eating them. Canidae is very high quality meat and grain-free. Plus her stools are compact and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great food for puppies!
customer_reviews.text: When we got our pup from her old owners she was used to Ol Roy dog food ... which is awful food. So we transitioned her to this and it was so easy, hardly any digestive reaction and she clearly loves it! She gets it as dry kibble in the morning and in the evening I put water in it just to add more water to her diet ... :) She likes it both ways!
customer_reviews.author: Thorita

customer_reviews.title: My Chihuahua-mix loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua-mix loves this stuff. I have repeatedly mixed it with Wellness Core Grain-Free for Small Breeds. Every time, he picked out and gobbled up the Canidae while rejecting the Wellness Core. Wellness Core is a great, healthy brand, but what good is the quality if my dog won't eat it? Canidae is also a high-quality brand and it's about half the price of Wellness Core. Easy choice; I'm going with the Canidae: better price, and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: We used to feed our dog 'Acana Heritage Meats Formula' but we recently realized that they were filed a lawsuit in March 2018. After hours and hours of researching dog food, We decided to try this food. I guess Acana dog food bites were too big to chew for our dog (He is 5 years old, Flat-coated retriever mix). Compare to Acana Canidae is a bit smaller size and my dog actually loves it and he enjoys chewing this Canidae dog food. Overall happy for this purchase
customer_reviews.author: TJ & Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I buy a lot of this stuff..
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don’t know why Amazon has me rating this food on flavor? I mean.. I didn’t taste it? But I gave it a 5 star rating on flavor cause what else can I do? The fur-kids seem to like it.. but they eat a lot of gross stuff too, so.. Yeah. Anyway, ingredients don’t seem to upset tummies and it seems as fresh as a dried meat cereal can be.
customer_reviews.author: John & Angie C.

customer_reviews.title: Appears to work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pit bull with allergies to see if it would help. She really likes the food and it appears to help. I still give her antihistamines multiple times a day and medicated baths weekly so it's hard to say if this is the sole reason why she has improved. It is very expensive, but appears to work for dogs with skin allergies.
customer_reviews.author: s. johnson

customer_reviews.title: I have a sensitive dog, this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have a mini labradoodle that we just adore. The cutest, most affectionate dog imaginable. The breeder recommended Candidae brand and she did fine. She seems to like it OK, but for us, watching her crunch down on the food just seems so non-appetizing. We love her so much that we search for 'better food'. Went with the expensive 'fresh made' food shipped monthly. She loved that food and it does seem much better looking. But soon, she sharted shedding. So we're back with Candidae. She's doing fine, shedding stopped. I'll be sticking with Candidae brand and find other ways to pamper our dog.
customer_reviews.author: YouMaybeRightIMaybeCrzy

customer_reviews.title: Not the real Canidae PURE
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this food....but this is not the right food. The kibble is a different texture, color, and smell. My dog will not eat this food, so I bought a smaller bag of the same brand and flavor to compare. She inhaled that food, further proving this is not the same Canidae PURE. I have requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ingredients. Please do not let the price scare ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ingredients. Please do not let the price scare you away. Look at the feeding requirements first! My dogs get less than half the food they used to because this is a much higher quality food!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rhew

customer_reviews.title: Dog won't touch it...
customer_reviews.text: Have a miniature Australian Shepherd that eats anything you put in front of her. Gave her CANIDAE PURE Real Salmon, and she smelled it, then looked up at me like I was crazy. She walked away disgusted. Never saw her do that with any food. So I am out $70 and will see if my neighbor's dog will eat the smelly stuff.
customer_reviews.author: ezseeker

customer_reviews.title: ... food that I purchased before because it's a very good brand and my little furry friend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Today I received this dog food that I purchased before because it's a very good brand and my little furry friend loves it. Also he tolerates this dry food well. I want to take the chance to Thank Amazon for replacing the bag very soon because the bag came with a cut on the side and we decided not to use it because We don't know the conditions... some of the dry Pebbles were outside in the box 📦 We are very very careful Parents and we love ❤️ our little furry friend. Thanks Amazon for replacing the bag of CANIDAE good product.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.N/P🐾

customer_reviews.title: The Good and The Bad
customer_reviews.text: My great Dane LOVED this brand. It was the best thing since he discovered trash. It was the only one that he did not produce obnoxious gas with and took to immediately without a long transition period. The downside was our Mastiff/Pyrenees mix did not fair too well. He had constant diarrhea until we went back to Natural Diamond Lamb and Rice. I've tried mixing this in with the other brand for him, but it is not going as well as I'd hoped. I will try the PURE Elements with Grains to see how well both fair and if we are able to find a brand both can digest well.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lamb flavor
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding this to the dog for about a year. After putting him on a no-grain diet, I used a few different brands, all available at major pet stores, before finding this one. Dude is a Corgi, so he has those pants that can get messy if he eats something wrong. We have not had to clean back there since he started eating this kibble, and his dumps are easy to pick up when walking. Gas is not an issue. Of the other over-the-counter grain free brands, Blue is the only other one I've tried that works good at a manageable price.
customer_reviews.author: paxpaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for our lab and shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this grain free food for our Labrador retriever who had allergies and skin issues. This has definitely seemed to helped. We also have a German Shepherd who is a very, very picky eater. We decided to try this for her as well just to make feeding easier on us and she loves it. This is the only food that she will consistently eat without a fight and without us having to doctor it up with broth or wet food. It's pricey, but we think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both of our OES love this food!
customer_reviews.text: Our OES had protein allergies with typical kibble food, so our vet had us trying prescription dog food for awhile. After a lot of research we discovered CANIDAE's PURE Sea dog food. With only 8 ingredients we can be confident that our dog is getting health food that no longer causes hot spots and skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Devin D.

customer_reviews.title: Price Almost Doubled in 8 mos.
customer_reviews.text: My Pom loves the chicken flavor, and the small breed kibble size is perfect for her. We've tried other flavors, she liked them all but clearly she prefers their chicken kibbles. I've noticed the last bag of chicken small breed seemed like the kibbles were a tiny bit smaller, a good thing for us. PS: Price on Amazon is a lot more than what you pay at the "helpful hardware place." And, if not in stock they will order at no additional cost. Update: 3/8/17. Stars deducted for the big price increase; nearly doubled since August 2016. What gives??? I'm checking local pet stores / feed stores for a better price. This is outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Buy USA!

customer_reviews.title: Worked Wonders for my Dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog continued to have large amounts of loose stool on several other brands. Once I tried this his stools are much smaller and normal. He also seems to love this food. I ordered the Duck. It may be pricey compared to lessor brands but the quality ingredients with no extra fillers are great for dogs with sensitive stomachs and digestive issues. It is also grain free which I think made a huge difference as well. This food also made my dog's coat dandruff free and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: MD2009

customer_reviews.title: New Formula Or Bad Batch?
customer_reviews.text: The kibble in this bag looks very different from all the other times I bought this, it's darker and smaller. I've been feeding this brand/flavor to my dog for over a year now and up until this bag it's been great. Either they changed the formula, made a packaging error or it's a bad batch. My dog has had explosive diarrhea since I started this bag so I got a new bag at the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: ppnfrsh

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great.
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull rescue has had skin, coat and appetite problems. So I mixed canned in w this and previous kibbles to generate appetite. It worked sort of. The Canidae does not need the canned, it generates much better appetite by its self with just a light sprinkle of water on it, to release the aroma probably...that’s all folks.
customer_reviews.author: bobjeri

customer_reviews.title: Not good for any of our three dogs, especially the 13 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Our senior dog lost weight on it which was not intentional. He was ravenous and would scout the house for snacks. Our vet had us switch off it due to concerns about muscle wasting. I now shy away from boutique brand dog foods and stuck with food that has been designed by a canine dietician. We switched to royal canin and our boy is doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kara K.

customer_reviews.title: Food covered with mold.
customer_reviews.text: We always order the same food for our dog. But when the last time we received it, it looked and smelled very different. We kept in a plastic box for the dog food and after a couple of weeks the food was covered with the green mold. It never happened before.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo vs Canidae
customer_reviews.text: We use to buy Blue Buffalo for our oldest dog so we used the same for our youngest pup when we got her. Unfortunately, she didn’t handle it very well so we tried a bunch of different foods until we found Canidae. Within the first day, she instantly started to look, act and poop better. We have not looked back. We ended up trying it for our oldest dog as well and it has made a major difference in his energy. He’s 10 years old and he’s acting like a puppy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walden

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog food, as does my dog, haha. She is super active, and Canidae always has a high level of protein in their dry foods. The only thing is the price tag (somewhat high), although I would rather spend a little more money on my dog to keep her in good health, and availability on Amazon is spotty (out of stock about half the time I check). Canidae is a great brand that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Knoots

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Found dead cockroaches in the food. I will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mims _

customer_reviews.title: My pet sick
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this dog food says that it is quite expensive premium quality and one trusts that it is a good product hard five days the dish served and my dogs ate it very little hard days with dearrea with blood and sad !!
customer_reviews.author: martin llerenas

customer_reviews.title: This premium dry dog food actually smells of umami from real fish
customer_reviews.text: This is a great premium dry dog food product. A bit more expensive but worth it. You'll notice your dogs coat to be softer and glossier. My beagle even shed less. You can tell its premium by the high protein percentage and by simply smelling the dog food. It actually has a meaty aroma compared to more economical dry dog foods.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Guo

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to love it, and she isn't showing signs of allergies anymore
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell/Border Collie (we think?) mutt loves her duck kibble breakfasts & dinners every day, and she doesn't lick her paws obsessively or seem to itch as much as she has with other diets! For her size (~35lbs), the 24lb bag lasts about two months with 2/3c twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.D.

customer_reviews.title: He has dry skin and a sensitive stomach and popular "good" foods like Taste of the Wild and Science Diet aggravate his ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. He has dry skin and a sensitive stomach and popular "good" foods like Taste of the Wild and Science Diet aggravate his system. I plan to keep ordering this formula.
customer_reviews.author: faya410435

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 dogs love it and the vet said they are extremely healthy. We have a 28 pound poodle/Aussie mix and a 52 pound American Pit mix. The cost of the food is more than offset by the vet bills we no longer have due to tummy issues and allergy issues. You do need to check each size bag before you purchase. Sometimes buying is bulk is cheaper. Sometimes it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Y

customer_reviews.title: My puppy hates this food.
customer_reviews.text: My Frenchie puppy hates this food. He leaves it to eat the Science Diet sensitive skin food my pit bull eats. He absolutely will nose through it and pick out the few pieces of Science Diet I've given him to encourage him to eat his own food. He will walk away from it when its all I give him.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bouffard

customer_reviews.title: Her poop is nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: My 6lb toy poodle has been eating this brand since she was a puppy and we swear by it. Her poop is nice and solid, and very small in amount (she goes maybe twice a day). The smell is not bad, since we give it to her in the morning and leave it out all day. And she doesn't seem to get sick of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Mold and Bacteria all over the newly arrived food and NOT BUYING THIS COMPANY'S DOG FOOD ANYMORE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this food for about 6 months. At first, my dog loves it. Gradually my dog starts to hate the food, so we thought she was tired of the flavor. Then we changed flavor and it seemed fine. The 4th time we ordered the food, my dog started to have diarrhea and refused to eat the food. I thought oh maybe time to change flavor again. We ordered it, and it came with mold and bacteria all over the place. It was unexpected and not acceptable. I don't feel it is Amazon's fault here unless it has storage issue. The manufacturing company is in fault because the food's expiration date is 1/20/2021. This food company is BAD!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Love for Canidae!
customer_reviews.text: Our Staffie loves Canidae! Before switching to this brand, she had extremely dry and itchy skin. I tried topical lotions (formulated for animals) and brushed her daily - but, her skin remained dry and flaky. My neighbor suggested this brand based on his personal experience. During our first bag, I noticed a gradual change in the overall appearance in her coat: it appeared shiny, glossy and smooth. The dry, flaky skin began to disappear and subsequent itching stopped. By the end of our first bag, I was very happy with the switch - and, our Staffie loves the food! We have eliminated all treats, as well. We use her Canidae kibble as "treats" for rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - Change in Formula?
customer_reviews.text: Something was off with the last bag I received. Did not smell right and had odd colored kibble in the mix. I no longer trust the brand for my 14 year old yellow lab and served him only two meals out this huge bag. He experienced some unusual issues shortly after consuming it. Not worth the price if I have question the quality as I now do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exc dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is exc quality food, grain free, dogs like, have used on and off for several years and never had issues. It also gets very good independent reviews. I purchased on Amazon at super value, but now the price is almost double. I won't purchase at >$17 for 4-lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: LadyExec

customer_reviews.title: giving her one or two pieces as a reward for good behavior. Transitioning to this was easy and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought CANIDAE Grain Free PURE Dry Dog Food to try for my maltese. She loves this and I even use this as a treat for her outside of mealtime, giving her one or two pieces as a reward for good behavior. Transitioning to this was easy and I did not encounter any complications. I started by mixing a bout 1/4 of this into her previous kibbles and increase 1/4 everyday until about 4-5 days, she's on Canidae completely.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Simple ingredients and quality dog food.
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm impressed. Both my dogs have bad allergies, one to everything with wings and the other to everything with hooves. This recipe is fairly simple and eliminates a lot of the junk filler that's found in other dog foods. We've been using the fish formula for 1 1/2 months now and the dogs are doing great.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: So many dog farts... I thought I ...
customer_reviews.text: So many dog farts... I thought I was going to suffocate from the gas that was coming out of my two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating canidae for 6.5 years. He's 8.5 years old now, healthy, happy, acts like a puppy. I alternate different flavors, he enjoys all of them. I was a little confused by the recent package change, but it seems like the food is still the same.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won't eat this stuff. I don't blame them; it doesn't smell like dog food.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Loves this over her old Wellness Brand
customer_reviews.text: My dog is super picky and usually pushes her food around. I tried this out of curiosity and dumped a cup over her regular Wellness Core dog food. SHE ATE THE WHOLE THING IN ONE SITTING! Usually I have to mix in wet food just to get her to look at it! I definitely will be buying this again. Didn't even have to transition her food, although I would recommend it. She just took to it. Also noticed the color was darker than her normal Wellness food. Guessing its the higher protein levels. Either way won't be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Z.

customer_reviews.title: Loves the flavor, more energy
customer_reviews.text: Our pup is a bit heavy, (mostly our fault, not his). However, we were able to maintain his weight on a weight management food, though he never really had the energy level he once had. Read the reviews of Canidae Pure Weight Management food, thought we would give it a try. Our pup loves it, noticed an increased energy during our walks, sleeps more soundly, actually lost some weight very quickly. We still have a weight goal to reach and this food just may just the start we need.
customer_reviews.author: david gambini

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients changed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the salmon grain free for three years now for my dog. However, I purchased this bag and I’ve been noticing that my dog is losing her hair and it’s flaky on particular parts of her. I took her to the vet and she told me it was the food and the sweet potato. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This dog food meets my needs and those of my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever is severely allergic to many foods. The Canidae Grain Free Pure salmon meets my needs and those of my dog perfectly and by buying it on subscription, I am able to save a few dollars on each purchase.
customer_reviews.author: macsog60

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are not getting sick and I think I found the right dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it .. I had A lots of problems with them getting sick and I was looking for something that they are not allergic to.. I think I found some things won't make my dogs sick and they are hipper 😂 oh man they just love the food
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Torres

customer_reviews.title: Cesar approves!
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my 1 year old pitbull who needs grain-free food. I've only tried two flavors: bison and salmon. My dog ate both with different results, at least for me. The bison flavor is great and is easy on his digestive system--solid poops, minimal gas. The salmon was a different story. It gave Cesar terrible, terrible, terrible gas! Silent but deadly, did he just poop? gas. NEVER AGAIN. So back to the bison flavor we went. Will stick with this since he likes it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppies Healthy food
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are so healthy and always arrive very fresh in the sealed bag. I like the size of the kibbles for my Bichons --- not too tiny and not too big. I have noticed my dogs are playing more and have a happier attitude. I also think they have trimmed down a little. They act like they are well satisfied and they appear very healthy so that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, going back to Nutro!
customer_reviews.text: Not as described, my dogs won't eat it. Puked, diarrhea, even after slowly adjusting the transition from Nutro to this junk.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Likes It
customer_reviews.text: Changed to Canidae because my thirteen year-old dog was not doing will on Beneful. Noticed quite an improvement in coat, comfortablilty and mobility on this product after several weeks. We also added the Zesty Paws multi-vitamin and the two together makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tallyho

product_meta.title: CANIDAE PURE Real Salmon, Limited Ingredient, Grain Free Premium Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Salmon & Sweet Potato| Size:24 lbCANIDAE PURE premium dry dog food is made with real food ingredients, formulated for all dogs, and those with additional sensitivities. With 7-10 key ingredients or less, your dog gets a complete, well-rounded meal crafted with their health and well-being at the forefront. CANIDAE PURE recipes always begin with real meat or fish first (Salmon, Lamb, Duck, Boar Bison, or Chicken), paired with whole foods like sweet potatoes, peas, lentils, or chickpeas. And we promise never any fillers - never any corn, wheat or soy. Every recipe includes high-protein ingredients for lean, strong muscles, added probiotics for easy digestion, vitamins/minerals and hard-working antioxidants for overall health and fatty acid blends for healthy skin and coat. Formulated for all life stages and most breed sizes, there is a CANIDAE PURE food that is perfect for your pup.
feature_bullets: 10 KEY INGREDIENTS or LESS: Limited ingredients crafted from 7-10 real foods in each bag of dog food, giving your good boys and girls everything they need and nothing they don’t.
GRAIN FREE FOR DOGS WITH SENSITIVE STOMACHS: There’s nothing questionable in a bowl of Canidae PURE. Never any wheat, corn, or soy.

HEALTHPLUS IN EVERY BITE: Probiotics added to every kibble after cooking to support healthy digestion, antioxidants to support a healthy immune system, and omega 6 & 3 fatty acids to support beautiful skin and coat.

FLAVORS & TYPES: With 6 different proteins (Salmon, Lamb, Duck, Boar, Bison Chicken), and formulations for all life stages and sizes (Puppy, Adult, Senior, Small Breed), there’s a Canidae PURE product your dog will love.
WE MAKE PET FOOD SIMPLE: Canidae PURE Limited Ingredient Diet dog food uses simple, whole-food recipes made right here in our Texas facility. Because pet food shouldn’t be complicated.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
